Workshop Topics

  • What is SVG
  • D3 and Enter, Update, Exit
  • How to make visualizations with D3plus
Tree Map Stacked Area Graph Network Rings Pie Scatter

What is D3plus?

  • Data Visualizations made easy.
  • A javascript library building upon D3
  • Open Source

What D3plus is not:

  • A replacement for D3
  • Finished!
